data.title: Ski Property for Sale
data.meta_description: Austrian real estate for sale. Holiday homes and investment property in Carinthia, Lake Ossiach, Bad Kleinkircheim. Wide choice of luxury ski apartments.
data.text:
Carinthia borders Italy and Slovenia and is one of the sunniest parts of Austria so it is no surprise it is a prime destination for summer sport lovers with an abundance of fun activities on offer including golf, water sports, tennis and hiking and cycling on one of its numerous signposted trails. The region is also home to 24 ski areas! Bad Kleinkircheim with 100km is one of the largest, but there are dozens of others to fit everyone's agenda.

In terms of property, unlike in more famous ski resorts In Austria, in Carinthia you will be able to find some great real estate for sale with no obligation to rent, so if you are looking for a more flexible holiday home (which still has the option to be rented out in your absence), this is the place for you. The most popular area tends to be the lively shore of the beautiful lake Ossiach with its wide range of summer leisure activities and the imposing skiing mountain Gerlitzen the valley lift of which is situated just a stone's throw away from the shore - ideal year-round destination and the ultimate holiday home spot!

Domus Global offers attractive lake-view apartments on sale in walking distance to the Gerlitzen gondola as well as first-line lake villas on sale.

Our guide to Carinthia
